description: Africa Oil Corp. engages in the exploration of oil and gas properties. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia and currently employs 39 full-time employees.  The firm is producing and development assets in deep-water offshore Nigeria, and development assets in Kenya. The firm also has a portfolio of exploration assets in Guyana, Kenya, Namibia, Nigeria, South Africa and in the Senegal Guinea Bissau Joint Development Zone (AGC). The firm holds its interests through direct ownership interests and through its shareholding companies, including Prime Oil & Gas Cooperatief U.A., Africa Energy Corp., Eco (Atlantic) Oil & Gas Ltd. and Oil and Gas Ltd. The firm has explored on onshore exploration blocks in East Africa and has made oil discoveries in the South Lokichar Basin located in the Tertiary Rift trend in Kenya.
naicsNationalIndustry: Crude Petroleum and Natural Gas Extraction
name: Africa Oil Corp
